checkerList.name: argumentSize
checkerList.description: Passing too small array as argument.

checkerList.name: arithOperationsOnVoidPointer
checkerList.description: When using void pointers in calculations, the behaviour is undefined

checkerList.name: arrayIndexThenCheck
checkerList.description: Array index is used before limits check

checkerList.name: assignBoolToPointer
checkerList.description: Assigning bool value to pointer (converting bool value to address)

checkerList.name: assignIfError
checkerList.description: Mismatching assignment and comparison, comparison is always false

checkerList.name: AssignmentAddressToInteger
checkerList.description: Assigning an address value to an integer (int/long/etc.) type is not portable

checkerList.name: assignmentInAssert
checkerList.description: Redefinition of a member variable in a subclass.

checkerList.name: AssignmentIntegerToAddress
checkerList.description: Assigning an integer (int/long/etc) to a pointer is not portable

checkerList.name: autoVariables
checkerList.description: Assigning address of local auto-variable to a function parameter

checkerList.name: bitwiseOnBoolean
checkerList.description: Boolean variable is used in bitwise operation

checkerList.name: CastAddressToIntegerAtReturn
checkerList.description: Returning an address value in a function with integer return type is not portable

checkerList.name: CastIntegerToAddressAtReturn
checkerList.description: Returning an integer in a function with pointer return type is not portable

checkerList.name: catchExceptionByValue
checkerList.description: Exception should be caught by reference

checkerList.name: charArrayIndex
checkerList.description: Using char type as array index

checkerList.name: charBitOp
checkerList.description: When using char variables in bit operations, sign extension can generate unexpected results

checkerList.name: charliteralwithcharptrcompare
checkerList.description: Comparing char literal with char pointer.

checkerList.name: checkCastIntToCharAndBack
checkerList.description: Storing func_name() return value in char variable and then comparing with EOF.

checkerList.name: commaSeparatedReturn
checkerList.description: Usage of comma in return statements

checkerList.name: compareBoolExpressionWithInt
checkerList.description: Comparison of a boolean expression with an integer other than 0 or 1

checkerList.name: comparisonOfBoolWithBoolError
checkerList.description: Comparison of a variable having boolean value using relational (<, >, <= or >=) operator

checkerList.name: comparisonOfBoolWithInt
checkerList.description: Suspicious comparison of a boolean with an integer

checkerList.name: comparisonOfBoolWithInvalidComparator
checkerList.description: Comparison of a boolean value using relational (<, >, <= or >=) operator

checkerList.name: comparisonOfFuncReturningBoolError
checkerList.description: Comparison of a function returning boolean value using relational (<, >, <= or >=) operator

checkerList.name: comparisonOfTwoFuncsReturningBoolError
checkerList.description: Comparison of two functions returning boolean value using relational (<, >, <= or >=) operator

checkerList.name: constStatement
checkerList.description: Redundant code: Found a statement that begins with type constant

checkerList.name: copyCtorPointerCopying
checkerList.description: Value of pointer 'varname', which points to allocated memory, is copied in copy constructor in

checkerList.name: coutCerrMisusage
checkerList.description: Invalid usage of output stream: '<< std::cout'

checkerList.name: dangerousUsageStrtol
checkerList.description: Invalid radix in call to strtol or strtoul. Must be 0 or 2-36

checkerList.name: deallocret
checkerList.description: Returning/dereferencing variable after it is deallocated / released

checkerList.name: deallocuse
checkerList.description: Dereferencing variable after it is deallocated / released

checkerList.name: derefInvalidIterator
checkerList.description: Possible dereference of an invalid iterator

checkerList.name: duplicateBreak
checkerList.description: Consecutive return, break, continue, goto or throw statements are unnecessary

checkerList.name: duplicateExpression
checkerList.description: Same expression on both sides of '&&'

checkerList.name: eraseDereference
checkerList.description: Dereferenced iterator an already erased iterator

checkerList.name: exceptRethrowCopy
checkerList.description: Throwing a copy of the caught exception instead of re-throwing the original exception

checkerList.name: fflushOnInputStream
checkerList.description: fflush() called on input stream "stdin" may result in undefined behavior

checkerList.name: functionStatic
checkerList.description: The member function 'funcname' can be static

checkerList.name: incorrectLogicOperator
checkerList.description: Suspicious use of the '||' logic operator

checkerList.name: incorrectStringBooleanError
checkerList.description: Suspicious comparison of boolean with a string literal

checkerList.name: incorrectStringCompare
checkerList.description: Mismatch of the string literal and legth argument for substr()

checkerList.name: incrementboolean
checkerList.description: Suspicious use of the postfix '++' operator on a boolean

checkerList.name: initializerList
checkerList.description: Member variable is in wrong order in the initializer list

checkerList.name: insecureCmdLineArgs
checkerList.description: Buffer overrun possible for long cmd-line args

checkerList.name: invalidIterator2
checkerList.description: Iterators may get invalid after push_back|push_front|insert

checkerList.name: invalidLengthModifierError
checkerList.description: 'modifier' in format string is a length modifier and cannot be used without a conversion specifier

checkerList.name: invalidPrintfArgType_float
checkerList.description: Invalid printf argument type (floating point number required)

checkerList.name: invalidPrintfArgType_n
checkerList.description: Invalid printf argument type (integer pointer required)

checkerList.name: invalidPrintfArgType_p
checkerList.description: Invalid printf argument type (integer or pointer required)

checkerList.name: invalidPrintfArgType_s
checkerList.description: Invalid printf argument type (character pointer required)

checkerList.name: invalidPrintfArgType_sint
checkerList.description: Invalid printf argument type (signed integer required)

checkerList.name: invalidPrintfArgType_uint
checkerList.description: Invalid printf argument type (unsigned integer required)

checkerList.name: invalidscanf
checkerList.description: scanf without field width limits can crash with huge input data

checkerList.name: invalidScanfArgType
checkerList.description: scanf argument no. 1: requires non-const pointers or arrays as arguments

checkerList.name: IOWithoutPositioning
checkerList.description: Read and write operations without a call to a positioning function

checkerList.name: iterators
checkerList.description: Same iterator is used with two different containers

checkerList.name: leakreturnvalnotused
checkerList.description: Return value of function not checked.

checkerList.name: literalWithCharPtrCompare
checkerList.description: String literal compared with a variable

checkerList.name: mallocOnClassError
checkerList.description: Bad memory allocation for class containing std::string.

checkerList.name: mallocOnClassWarning
checkerList.description: Memory for class instance allocated with malloc(), but class provides constructors.

checkerList.name: memleakOnRealloc
checkerList.description: Common realloc mistake: variable nulled but not freed upon failure

checkerList.name: memsetClass
checkerList.description: Invalid usage of memset|memmove|memcpy on classes

checkerList.name: memsetvalueoutofrange
checkerList.description: memset() with a value out of range as the 2nd parameter.

checkerList.name: missingPercentCharacter
checkerList.description: Missing percent end character in pattern

checkerList.name: moduloAlwaysTrueFalse
checkerList.description: Comparison of modulo result is predetermined

checkerList.name: noConstructor
checkerList.description: Class does not have a constructor

checkerList.name: noCopyConstructor
checkerList.description: 'classname' does not have a copy constructor which is recommended since the class contains a pointer to allocated memory

checkerList.name: noexplicitconstructor
checkerList.description: Class has a constructor with 1 argument that is not explicit.

checkerList.name: nonreentrantFunctionsgethostbyname
checkerList.description: For threadsafe applications it is recommended to use the reentrant replacement function /gethostbyname_r/

checkerList.name: nonreentrantFunctionslocaltime
checkerList.description: For threadsafe applications it is recommended to use the reentrant replacement function /localtime_r/

checkerList.name: nonreentrantFunctionsreaddir
checkerList.description: For threadsafe applications it is recommended to use the reentrant replacement function /readdir_r/

checkerList.name: nonreentrantFunctionsstrtok
checkerList.description: For threadsafe applications it is recommended to use the reentrant replacement function /strtok_r/

checkerList.name: operatorEqToSelf
checkerList.description: 'operator=' should check for assignment to self

checkerList.name: operatorEqVarError
checkerList.description: Member variable is not assigned a value in the assignment operator

checkerList.name: oppositeInnerCondition
checkerList.description: Opposite conditions in nested 'if' blocks lead to a dead code block

checkerList.name: outOfBounds
checkerList.description: Index is out of bounds: Supplied size is larger than actual size

checkerList.name: passedByValue
checkerList.description: Function parameter should be passed by reference

checkerList.name: pointerLessThanZero
checkerList.description: A pointer can not be negative so it is either pointless or an error to check if it is

checkerList.name: pointerPositive
checkerList.description: A pointer can not be negative so it is either pointless or an error to check if it is not

checkerList.name: pointerSize
checkerList.description: Using size of pointer variable instead of size of its data

checkerList.name: possibleBufferAccessOutOfBounds
checkerList.description: Possible buffer overflow if strlen(source) is larger than or equal to sizeof(destination)

checkerList.name: possibleReadlinkBufferOverrun
checkerList.description: Function might return the full size of variable

checkerList.name: postfixOperator
checkerList.description: Prefer prefix ++/-- operators for non-primitive types

checkerList.name: purgedConfiguration
checkerList.description: The configuration was not checked because its code equals another one.

checkerList.name: readWriteOnlyFile
checkerList.description: Read operation on a file that was opened only for writing

checkerList.name: redundantAssignment
checkerList.description: Variable 'var' is reassigned a value before the old one has been used

checkerList.name: redundantBitwiseOperationInSwitch
checkerList.description: Redundant bitwise operation on variable in switch

checkerList.name: redundantCopy
checkerList.description: Buffer 'var' is being written before its old content has been used

checkerList.name: redundantCopyInSwitch
checkerList.description: Buffer 'var' is being written before its old content has been used

checkerList.name: redundantCopyLocalConst
checkerList.description: Use const reference for 'varname' to avoid unnecessary data copying

checkerList.name: redundantIfRemove
checkerList.description: Redundant checking of STL container element

checkerList.name: redundantNextPrevious
checkerList.description: Call to 'Token::func1()' followed by 'Token::func2()' can be simplified

checkerList.name: returnAddressOfAutoVariable
checkerList.description: Return of the address of an auto-variable

checkerList.name: returnAddressOfFunctionParameter
checkerList.description: Return the address of a function parameter

checkerList.name: returnLocalVariable
checkerList.description: Returning pointer to local array variable

checkerList.name: sizeArgumentAsChar
checkerList.description: The size argument is given as a char constant

checkerList.name: sizeofwithnumericparameter
checkerList.description: Using sizeof with a numeric constant as function argument might not be what you intended

checkerList.name: sizeofwithsilentarraypointer
checkerList.description: Using sizeof for array given as function argument returns the size of pointer

checkerList.name: sprintfOverlappingData
checkerList.description: Undefined behavior: variable is used as parameter and destination in s[n]printf()

checkerList.name: stlBoundries
checkerList.description: Dangerous container iterator compare using < operator for container

checkerList.name: stlcstr
checkerList.description: Dangerous usage of c_str(). The returned value by c_str() is invalid after this call

checkerList.name: stlcstrthrow
checkerList.description: The returned value by c_str() is invalid after throw call

checkerList.name: stlIfFind
checkerList.description: Suspicious condition. The result of find is an iterator, but it is not properly checked

checkerList.name: stlIfStrFind
checkerList.description: Suspicious checking of string::find() return value

checkerList.name: StlMissingComparison
checkerList.description: Missing bounds check for extra iterator increment in loop

checkerList.name: stlOutOfBounds
checkerList.description: When i==foo.size(), foo[i] is out of bounds

checkerList.name: suspiciousSemicolon
checkerList.description: Suspicious use of ; at the end of 'if/for/while' statement

checkerList.name: switchCaseFallThrough
checkerList.description: Switch falls through case without comment

checkerList.name: terminateStrncpy
checkerList.description: The buffer may not be zero-terminated after the call to strncpy()

checkerList.name: tooManyConfigs
checkerList.description: The checking of the file will be interrupted because there are too many #ifdef configurations.

checkerList.name: udivError
checkerList.description: Unsigned division. The result will be wrong

checkerList.name: unassignedVariable
checkerList.description: Variable is not assigned a value

checkerList.name: uninitdata
checkerList.description: Data is allocated but not initialized

checkerList.name: uninitMemberVar
checkerList.description: Member variable is not initialized in the constructor

checkerList.name: uninitstring
checkerList.description: Dangerous usage of variable (strncpy doesn't always 0-terminate it)

checkerList.name: unreachableCode
checkerList.description: Statements following return, break, continue, goto or throw will never be executed

checkerList.name: unsafeClassCanLeak
checkerList.description: Class 'classname' is unsafe, 'varname' can leak by wrong usage

checkerList.name: unsignedLessThanZero
checkerList.description: Checking if unsigned variable is less than zero

checkerList.name: unsignedPositive
checkerList.description: An unsigned variable can't be negative so it is unnecessary to test it

checkerList.name: unusedAllocatedMemory
checkerList.description: Variable is allocated memory that is never used

checkerList.name: useAutoPointerArray
checkerList.description: Usage of 'auto_ptr' for pointers obtained with operator 'new[]'

checkerList.name: useAutoPointerContainer
checkerList.description: Don't store 'auto-ptr' in a STL container

checkerList.name: useClosedFile
checkerList.description: Used file that is not opened

checkerList.name: useInitializationList
checkerList.description: member variable shall be initialized using constructor

checkerList.name: uselessassignmentarg
checkerList.description: Assignment of function parameter has no effect outside the function.

checkerList.name: uselessCallsCompare
checkerList.description: It is inefficient to call 'str.find(str)' as it always returns 0

checkerList.name: uselessCallsSubstr
checkerList.description: Function 'substr' useless call. Function create copy of the 'str' object

checkerList.name: uselessCallsSwap
checkerList.description: It is inefficient to swap a object with itself by calling 'str.swap(str)'

checkerList.name: varFuncNullUB
checkerList.description: Passing NULL after the last typed argument to a variadic function leads to undefined behaviour.

checkerList.name: variableHidingEnum
checkerList.description: Variable hides enumerator with same name

checkerList.name: variableHidingTypedef
checkerList.description: Variable hides typedef with same name

checkerList.name: variableScope
checkerList.description: The scope of the variable can be reduced

checkerList.name: virtualDestructor
checkerList.description: Base classes should have virtual destructors

checkerList.name: writeReadOnlyFile
checkerList.description: Write operation on a file that was opened only for reading

checkerList.name: wrongcctypecall
checkerList.description: Wrong usage of a function from the ctype-family

checkerList.name: wrongmathcall
checkerList.description: Passing value to () leads to undefined result

checkerList.name: wrongPipeParameterSize
checkerList.description: A buffer must have size of 2 integers if used as parameter of pipe().

checkerList.name: wrongPrintfScanfArgNum
checkerList.description: Wrong number of parameters given to printf()

checkerList.name: zerodivcond
checkerList.description: Either the condition is useless or there is division by zero

checkerList.name: sec_ri_https
checkerList.description: you should not save important value without encrypt it

checkerList.name: sec_ri_secure_storage
checkerList.description: you have hardcoded an important information. use secure storage instead.

checkerList.name: sec_ins_input_proc
checkerList.description: you should not use atoied value directly to ptr operation. you need to check it's range and validity

checkerList.name: sec_acc_control
checkerList.description: chmod : you requested too much permission.

checkerList.name: sec_path_modi
checkerList.description: fopen : you should check symbolic link using realpath.

checkerList.name: sec_env_use
checkerList.description: env value can be hooked by a hacker.

checkerList.name: sec_enc_ret_priv_addr
checkerList.description: (broken capsulation) you should not return private array member.

checkerList.name: sec_enc_set_priv_mem
checkerList.description: (broken capsulation) you should not assign a ptr to a private member.

checkerList.name: sec_wsf_aes_encrypt
checkerList.description: you should use more long encryption key.

checkerList.name: sec_wsf_sha
checkerList.description: you should use more strong hash function.

checkerList.name: sec_wsf_rand
checkerList.description: rand : you should call srand before.

checkerList.name: sec_bof_printf
checkerList.description: you should not call denied function

checkerList.name: sec_bof_snprintf
checkerList.description: you should use constant string for format specifier or not, it can be injected

checkerList.name: sec_bof_strcpy
checkerList.description: you should not call denied function

checkerList.name: sec_bof_strcat
checkerList.description: you should not call denied function

checkerList.name: sec_bof_strncat
checkerList.description: cannot find sizeof and strlen in 3rd parameter. best practice is strncat (dest, src, sizeof(dest) - 1 - strlen(dest))

checkerList.name: sec_bof_gets
checkerList.description: you should not call denied function

checkerList.name: sec_bof_pcstring_print
checkerList.description: you should use constant string for format specifier or not, it can be injected

checkerList.name: sec_bof_realpath
checkerList.description: you need to set buffer size as PATH_MAX

checkerList.name: sec_bof_scanf_format
checkerList.description: scanf without field width limits can crash with huge input data.

checkerList.name: sec_bof_pcmem_memcpy
checkerList.description: plz check if you copy the null byte. example strlen(x) + 1.

checkerList.name: sec_bof_memcpy
checkerList.description: plz check if you copy the null byte. example strlen(x) + 1.

checkerList.name: basicStringTypeMisused
checkerList.description: std::basic_string character type misused. use only (char or wchar_t) types in basic_string (C++98).

checkerList.name: assignmentTypeCastedAddressToInteger
checkerList.description: Assigning a pointer to an integer is not portable.

checkerList.name: typeCastedAddressToIntegerAtReturn
checkerList.description: Returning an integer in a function with pointer return type is not portable.

checkerList.name: usleepCalled
checkerList.description: The obsolescent function 'usleep' is called. POSIX.1-2001 declares usleep() function obsolescent and POSIX.1-2008 removes it. It is recommended that new applications use the 'nanosleep' or 'setitimer' function.

checkerList.name: nullPointerRedundantCheck
checkerList.description: Either the condition is redundant or there is possible null pointer dereference: pProDetail.

checkerList.name: rand_rcalled
checkerList.description: Obsolescent function 'rand_r' called. It is recommended to use 'rand' instead.
